body.name: Pack of 4 Microwave Potato Cooker Dropbyy Reusable Microwave Bag for Potato Express Pouch Cooking in Just 4 Minutes Red
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 7 hrs 26 mins
features: Dropbby suitable daily life- A convenient microwave accessory for cooking potatoes, 4 pcs in one set!
Made of 100% polyester fiber cloth, safe to use, washable and reusable.
Our potato bags are approximately 10x8 inches. Works for all types of potatoes, corn on the cob, yams and so on.
Perfectly cooking in 4 minutes, please be aware that according to the size of potatoes, there may be 1-3 minutes difference.
The microwave potato bag could Effectively keep moisture and prevent the potatoes shrinking when in cooking, keep potatoes' shape, taste better!
body.description: Product information: Package include: 4 pieces Material: Polyester fabric, fiber Weight: 100g Size of each: 9.8 x7.1 inches Capacity: 1-4 medium sized potatoes Operation Method: 1.Slip 1-4 washed potatoes into the bags and place them in the microwave then close the flap. 2.Place it in the microwave and in 4 minutes you can have fully cooked potatoes. 3.Carefully remove Potato bag from the microwave then carefully remove potatoes. 4.Cut them open, add your favorite baked potato toppings, and enjoy. Note: The exact time of cooking depends on the size of the potato, normally, it takes about 4 minutes. The material of the microwave potato bag is 100% polyester fiber cloth, non-toxic, tasteless, environmentally friendly. They are machine washable and reusable. Guaranteed: We are confident enough for the quality of our product, any quality issue or inconfidence to the product, we promise a 100% refund with no reason. Any other question, please feel free to contact us as well. And please be aware that we are only resoponsible for that quality of the product from our store Dropbyy, please make sure of it before purchasing. Your understanding will be highly appreciated.

reviews.reviewText: These potato cooking bags are perfect for a hot juicy potato right out of the microwave. No more rubbery dried-out potatoes with this!

reviews.reviewText: I use it for sweet potatoes, baked potatoes, corn (either in the husk or 'naked'). 4 minutes for either and it's perfect every time.
